meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is gathered into a knot at the back of the head.
meanings.sent1: She styled her hair into a beautiful chignon for the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina's chignon stayed perfectly in place during her performance.
meanings.sent3: The chignon looked like a fancy bun that a princess would wear.
meanings.sent4: Her chignon was like a neat little package holding all her hair together.
meanings.sent5: The chignon added an elegant touch to her overall look.

meanings.definition: A knot or coil of hair worn at the back of the head.
meanings.sent1: The chignon she wore to the party was a work of art.
meanings.sent2: Her chignon was adorned with a delicate hairpin.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly called her chignon a 'hair nest'.
meanings.sent4: The chignon resembled a small cinnamon bun on her head.
meanings.sent5: The intricate chignon was the highlight of her hairstyle.
